full_output.summary: Flexible full-stack developer with expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for engaging web pages. Skilled in React.js for interactive interfaces and experienced in Node.js for server-side development. Proficient with web frameworks and skilled in version control for seamless collaboration across the stack.

certifications.title: DSA Self-Paced with Geeks for Geeks

projects.name: Restaurant Website
projects.description: Designed and developed a restaurant website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Successfully implemented features, enhanced menu display, advanced table booking, detailed chef profiles, and latest news articles. Crafted a user-friendly interface with responsive design, improving navigation efficiency across various devices.

projects.name: Food Ordering Website
projects.description: Engineered a responsive and interactive food ordering website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Executed pivotal features, including the implementation of Our Services, Our Happy Client section, and a Feedback Form. Successfully executed pivotal features, resulting in increased client satisfaction and active engagement.

projects.name: Travel Website
projects.description: Designed a personalized trip planning feature, enabling users to search and customize their favorite destination with activities, attractions, and accommodations using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented a real-time tracking feature showcasing the number of trip plans created on the website for the current day, contributing to improved user engagement and site activity.

full_output.name: Shivam Bhardwaj
